Yggdrasil came up near Devilcat and looked at the data displayed.

Yggdrasil: That is a new ship design. Seems like a warship to me, and
since it's new, they might well have lots more where they come from.
That means they're not alone. As for personel, I can't say much. Never
fought Tripreds. But they might be elite, or they might be green
rookies that have been placed there to man the ship. However, rookies
could not have landed the ship as successfully as they just did. There
is something else. The survivors of the first group probably had time
to observe things here and I am convinced that they have gathered some
intelligence on most people here. The newcomers now have that edge. A
frontal assault is totally out of question.
he Tripreds, but getting this forcefield off is a
